messages.content: You are a helpful assistant.
What is likely to happen to a truck in a collision?
Likely to wreck a truck outright.
You are a helpful assistant.
How likely is a car to be wrecked in a collision?
Almost certain to wreck a car.
You are a helpful assistant.
What are the three cultists doing when they arrive at the investigators' apartment?
They are turning up at their door.
You are a helpful assistant.
How do the three investigators decide to proceed?
They decide to head in the same direction.
You are a helpful assistant.
What type of roll does the Keeper ask for from the investigators?
A speed roll (CON) roll.
You are a helpful assistant.
What impediment does each side have in the speed roll?
Climbing out of the window for the investigators and breaking the door down for the cultists.
You are a helpful assistant.
What is the result when Scott rolls his CON roll?
You are a helpful assistant.
What is the speed order of the cultists in the chase?
Cultist A (7), Cultist B (7), Cultist C (9)
You are a helpful assistant.
What is the speed roll of Scott?
MOV 10
You are a helpful assistant.
What is the speed roll of Cultist C?
MOV 9
You are a helpful assistant.
What is the speed order of the pursuing cultists?
Cultist A (7), Cultist B (7), Cultist C (9)
You are a helpful assistant.
What is the speed order of the fleeing investigators?
Harvey (5), Brian (8), Scott (10)
You are a helpful assistant.
What is the gap between Cultist C and Harvey?
The gap is set to the default of 2 locations.
You are a helpful assistant.
Where does Brian start the chase?
Brian starts 3 locations ahead of Harvey.
You are a helpful assistant.
Who is 3 locations ahead of Harvey?
Brian
You are a helpful assistant.
What is the status of Cultist C?
Cultist C has gone through the window and is now in the yard behind Harvey
You are a helpful assistant.
What is the position of Cultist A and B?
Cultist A and B stand at the window, about to climb out
You are a helpful assistant.
What has happened to the investigators?
They have fled their apartment through the window
